pages.text: New American Southern Warm, Inviting Neighborhood Bistro Located in Mt. Pleasant, Stack's Evening Eats is a modern American bistro from owners Darcy and Chef Patrick Stack. Phone (843) 388-6968 Location 1440 Ben Sawyer BoulevardSte 1107Mount Pleasant, SC 29464 Hours 5:00pm – 9:30pm Monday – Thursday 5:00pm – 10:00pm Friday 5:00pm – 10:00pm Saturday Closed Sundays Snapper Bibb Lettuce Wedge Salad Tuna Nachos Scallop Salad Grilled Salmon Starters Marinated Mixed Olives Housemade Fried Pickles Truffle-Asiago Fries Fried Jumbo Shrimp Citrus Slaw, Peach-Horseradish Marmalade, Toasted Coconut Tuna Nachos* Wontons, Avocado, Wasabi & Ginger Sauces Fresh Mozzarella Stuffed Risotto Fritters Crispy Brussels Sprouts Smoked Tomato-Herb Dipping Sauce Cornmeal Fried Oysters Bill’s Remoulade Shrimp & Grits Andouille Sausage, Tomatoes, Vegetable Gravy, Edisto Island Grits Soup & Salad Tomato Basil Soup or Soup of the Day Add: Shrimp / Fried Oysters / Salmon / Tuna / Chicken Classic Caesar Croutons, Parmesan Add: Shrimp / Fried Oysters / Salmon / Tuna / Chicken Poached Apple Baby Greens, Blue Cheese, Walnuts, Raspberry-Malbec Vinaigrette Roasted Beet Arugula, Feta, Candied Pecans, Mint, Buttermilk Dressing Fried Oyster Mixed Greens, Tomato, Pickled Red Onion, Carrots, Spicy Thousand Island Dressing Traditional House Salad Entrees Sautéed Shrimp Baby Spinach, Tomato, Olive Oil, Basil, Asiago, Fusilli Noodles Grilled Salmon* Stewed Tomatoes, Spinach, Feta, Zucchini, Olives, Fettuccine Grilled Ahi Tuna* Baby Spinach, Petite Potatoes, Whole Grain Mustard Buttercream Cornflake Crusted Flounder Edisto Island Grits, Butter Beans, Old Bay Hollandaise Braised Chicken Wild Mushrooms, Smoked Tomatoes, Spinach, Campanelle Noodles, House Made Ricotta Roasted 13oz Pork Chop* Bacon Braised Cabbage, Caramelized Shallots, Irish Whiskey Pan Jus Fresh Ground Burger* Bacon, Choice of Cheese, Lettuce, Tomato, Onion, Hand Cut Fries Petite Filets* Hand Cut Fries, Madeira Mushroom Sauce *Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness. Sparkling Benvolio Prosecco Italy Villa Sandi Sparkling Brut Rosé Italy Veuve Du Vernay Brut France La Marca Prosecco Italy White Belleruche Rosé France Santa Marina Pinot Grigio Italy J Pinot Gris California, USA Peter Mertes Riesling Germany Arca Nova Vinho Verde Portugal Perrin Côtes du Rhone France Whitehaven Sauvignon Blanc New Zealand William Hill Chardonnay California, USA La Crema Chardonnay California, USA Red Perrin Côtes du Rhône France Carmel Road Pinot Noir Central Coast, California, USA Elouan Pinot Noir Oregon, USA Evolution Pinot Noir Willamette Valley, Oregon, USA Alexander Valley Merlot California, USA Amalaya Malbec Argentina Abstract Red Blend Saint Helena, California, USA Ed Meades Zinfandel Mendocino County, California, USA Storypoint Cabernet Sauvignon Washington, USA Oberon Cabernet Sauvignon Napa County, California, USA Stag’s Leap Petite Syrah Napa Valley, California USA Reservations Call (843) 388-6968 from 5:00pm daily or book below online with Resy.Reservations required for parties of 6 or more.
